summary: This document is a deed for the property located at 9 East 71st Street, Manhattan, New York, transferring ownership from Nine East 71st Street Corporation to Maple, Inc. The deed includes details about the property, the parties involved, and compliance with local regulations regarding smoke detectors. This document contains financial records related to property taxes and liens associated with Jeffrey Epstein's property at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY. It details outstanding charges, tax assessments, and a lis pendens judgment filed against Epstein by the United States government.

persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the President of Nine East 71st Street Corporation, the grantor in the property transfer.

persons.name: Erika Kellerhals
persons.context: Erika Kellerhals is mentioned as the attorney representing the buyer, Maple, Inc.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the debtor in a lis pendens judgment related to his property at 9 East 71st Street.

persons.context: Maple, Inc. is listed as the owner of the property at 9 East 71st Street, which is associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Property Transfer

events.description: The NYC Department of Finance issued a property tax bill for 9 East 71st Street, with a total amount due of $173,510.58.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, Manhattan, New York, NY 10021
keyFacts: The property at 9 East 71st Street was sold for a nominal amount of ten dollars.
Jeffrey E. Epstein executed the deed as President of Nine East 71st Street Corporation.
Erika Kellerhals is the attorney for the buyer, Maple, Inc.
The deed includes a covenant against the grantor's acts.
The document includes compliance with smoke detector requirements as per New York City regulations.
A lis pendens judgment was filed against Jeffrey Epstein by the United States on July 11, 2019.
Maple, Inc. is listed as the owner of the property at 9 East 71st Street.
The total amount due for property taxes on July 1, 2019, was $173,510.58.
Outstanding charges for the property were reported as $0.00 prior to the new charges.
The estimated market value of the property is $55,931,000.
